title: Baxter Reports $2.85 Billion in Sales in Preliminary 3Q Report
text:
By Micah Maidenberg

Baxter International Inc. (BAX) reported preliminary third-quarter results on Thursday in addition to disclosing that it may need to amend several years of financial statements.

The medical-products company reported global sales of about $2.85 billion for the quarter, slightly lower than the average analyst estimate on FactSet. Sales grew 3% compared with last year and 5% after adjustments, Baxter said.

The company also reported operating income of $503 million for the quarter. After adjustments, operating income totaled $555 million.

Shares of Baxter weakened in premarket trading after the company said it may need to restate results going back five years due to an accounting error connected to intra-company foreign exchange transactions.

Write to Micah Maidenberg at micah.maidenberg@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 24, 2019 08:28 ET (12:28 GMT)
